name: Dice Explorer
description:
Description

In Dice Explorer, you explore a dark dungeon, trying to reach its deepest point. Throw your dice, build your own path, defeat the orks on your way and get to the end of the tunnel!

Controls are explained in the main menu of the game. You can also open the tutorial anytime with H.

Tools

Engine: Unity

Graphics: Gimp

Music/Sound design: Reaper, my mic, my guitar and too much reverb

Font: Yoster Island

Feelings

It took me some time to find an idea that I like. I first thought I would go for yet another platformer. I finally came with an idea that takes some inspirations from Yu-Gi-Oh! Dungeondice Monsters and Loop Hero. I really love the concept and hope to build something bigger with that idea in the future.

Trying to go minimalistic for the graphics was real fun. It made me feel weird not to use the animation tool during this jam x)

Hope you enjoy the game, have fun! Screenshots
